appStore.name: Ticketless Chicago
appStore.subtitle: Peace of Mind Parking
appStore.description:
Ticketless Chicago automatically detects when you park and alerts you about parking restrictions before you get a ticket.

FEATURES:

- AUTOMATIC PARKING DETECTION
Connect your phone to your car's Bluetooth. When you park and disconnect, Ticketless instantly checks your location for parking restrictions.

- REAL-TIME ALERTS
Get notified immediately if you're parked in a street cleaning zone, snow route, permit-only area, or during a winter overnight ban.

- STREET CLEANING SCHEDULES
Know exactly when street cleaning happens on your block so you can move your car in time.

- SNOW BAN MONITORING
When Chicago declares a snow emergency, we'll alert you if you're parked on a snow route.

- WINTER OVERNIGHT BAN
Don't get caught by the 3am-7am winter parking ban on major streets.

- PERMIT ZONE DETECTION
Parking in a residential permit zone? We'll let you know so you don't get ticketed.

- PARKING HISTORY
Review all your past parking checks and see potential violations you avoided.

- WORKS IN BACKGROUND
Once set up, Ticketless works automatically even when the app is closed.

SAVE MONEY:
The average Chicago parking ticket costs $65-$200. Avoid just one ticket and Ticketless pays for itself many times over.

PRIVACY FOCUSED:
Your location data is only used to check parking rules and is never sold to third parties.

REQUIREMENTS:
- iPhone with Bluetooth capability
- Car with Bluetooth connectivity
- Location permissions (to check parking rules at your location)

Download Ticketless Chicago today and never worry about parking tickets again!
appStore.keywords: parking,chicago,tickets,street cleaning,snow ban,parking violation,car,bluetooth,permit,parking meter,tow zone
appStore.promotionalText: Auto-detect parking restrictions and avoid costly tickets in Chicago!
appStore.whatsNew: Initial release! Automatic parking detection, street cleaning alerts, snow ban monitoring, and more.
